001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http;
003
004import java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Optional;
007import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
008import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
009import java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService;
010import java.util.function.Function;
011
012import dev.failsafe.Failsafe;
013import dev.failsafe.FailsafeExecutor;
014import dev.failsafe.RetryPolicy;
015import dev.failsafe.event.ExecutionAttemptedEvent;
016import dev.failsafe.spi.Scheduler;
017
018import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
019import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.JsonException;
020import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.JsonUtils;
021
022import org.slf4j.Logger;
023import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
024
025/**
026 * Implementation for a retry of a requests upon configured response status codes
027 */
028public class RetryMiddleware implements RetryRequestMiddleware, AutoCloseable {
029    static final String loggerName = ClientBuilder.COMMERCETOOLS + ".retry";
030
031    /**
032     * @deprecated use {@link RetryRequestMiddleware#DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY} instead
033     */
034    @Deprecated
035    public static final int DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY = RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY;
036    /**
037     * @deprecated use {@link RetryRequestMiddleware#DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY} instead
038     */
039    @Deprecated
040    public static final int DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY = RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY;
041    /**
042     * @deprecated use {@link RetryRequestMiddleware#DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES} instead
043     */
044    @Deprecated
045    public static final List<Integer> DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES = RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES;
046    private static final InternalLogger logger = InternalLogger.getLogger(loggerName);
047    private static final Logger classLogger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RetryMiddleware.class);
048
049    private final FailsafeExecutor<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> failsafeExecutor;
050
051    /**
052     * @deprecated use {@link RetryRequestMiddleware#of(int)} instead
053     */
054    @Deprecated
055    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries) {
056        this(Scheduler.DEFAULT, maxRetries, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY,
057            RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES, null);
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * @deprecated use {@link RetryRequestMiddleware#of(int, List)} instead
062     */
063    @Deprecated
064    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final List<Integer> statusCodes) {
065        this(Scheduler.DEFAULT, maxRetries, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY,
066            RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY, statusCodes, null);
067    }
068
069    RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final List<Integer> statusCodes,
070            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
071        this(Scheduler.DEFAULT, maxRetries, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY,
072            RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY, statusCodes, failures);
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * @deprecated use {@link RetryRequestMiddleware#of(int, long, long)} instead
077     */
078    @Deprecated
079    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay) {
080        this(Scheduler.DEFAULT, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES, null);
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * @deprecated use {@link RetryRequestMiddleware#of(int, long, long, List)} instead
085     */
086    @Deprecated
087    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
088            final List<Integer> statusCodes) {
089        this(Scheduler.DEFAULT, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, statusCodes, null);
090    }
091
092    RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay, final List<Integer> statusCodes,
093            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
094        this(Scheduler.DEFAULT, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
095                .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes)));
096    }
097
098    RetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
099            final List<Integer> statusCodes, final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
100        this(executorService, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
101                .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes)));
102    }
103
104    RetryMiddleware(final ScheduledExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries, final long delay,
105            final long maxDelay, final List<Integer> statusCodes, final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
106        this(executorService, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
107                .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes)));
108    }
109
110    RetryMiddleware(final Scheduler scheduler, final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
111            final List<Integer> statusCodes, final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
112        this(scheduler, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
113                .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes)));
114    }
115
116    RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
117            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
118        this(Scheduler.DEFAULT, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, fn);
119    }
120
121    RetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
122            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
123        this(Scheduler.of(executorService), maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, fn);
124    }
125
126    RetryMiddleware(final ScheduledExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries, final long delay,
127            final long maxDelay, final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
128        this(Scheduler.of(executorService), maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, fn);
129    }
130
131    RetryMiddleware(final Scheduler scheduler, final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
132            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
133        RetryPolicy<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> retryPolicy = fn
134                .apply(RetryPolicy.<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> builder()
135                        .withBackoff(delay, maxDelay, ChronoUnit.MILLIS)
136                        .withJitter(0.25)
137                        .withMaxRetries(maxRetries)
138                        .onRetry(this::logEventFailure))
139                .build();
140        this.failsafeExecutor = Failsafe.with(retryPolicy).with(scheduler);
141    }
142
143    private void logEventFailure(ExecutionAttemptedEvent<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> event) {
144        final int attempt = event.getAttemptCount();
145
146        logger.info(() -> "Retry #" + attempt);
147        logger.trace(() -> {
148            final Throwable failure = event.getLastFailure();
149            if (failure instanceof ApiHttpException) {
150                final ApiHttpException httpException = (ApiHttpException) failure;
151                final ApiHttpRequest request = httpException.getRequest();
152                final ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response = httpException.getResponse();
153                if (request != null) {
154                    return requestLog(attempt, request, response);
155                }
156            }
157            return event.toString();
158        });
159    }
160
161    private String requestLog(final int attempt, ApiHttpRequest request, ApiHttpResponse<?> response) {
162        String output;
163        final String httpMethodAndUrl = request.getMethod().name() + " " + request.getUrl().toString();
164        if (request.getBody() != null) {
165            final String unformattedBody = request.getSecuredBody();
166            final boolean isJsonRequest = request.getHeaders()
167                    .getHeaders(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE)
168                    .stream()
169                    .findFirst()
170                    .map(ct -> ct.getValue().toLowerCase().contains("json"))
171                    .orElse(true);
172            if (isJsonRequest) {
173                String prettyPrint;
174                try {
175                    prettyPrint = JsonUtils.prettyPrint(unformattedBody);
176                }
177                catch (final JsonException e) {
178                    classLogger.warn("pretty print failed", e);
179                    prettyPrint = unformattedBody;
180                }
181                output = "Retry #" + attempt + ": " + request + "\n" + httpMethodAndUrl + "\nformatted: " + prettyPrint;
182            }
183            else {
184                output = "Retry #" + attempt + ": " + request + "\n" + request.getMethod().name() + " "
185                        + request.getUrl() + " " + unformattedBody;
186            }
187        }
188        else {
189            output = "Retry #" + attempt + ": " + request + "\n" + httpMethodAndUrl + " <no body>";
190        }
191        if (response != null) {
192            output += "\nFailure response: " + response.getStatusCode() + "\n" + response + "\n"
193                    + Optional.ofNullable(response.getBody())
194                            .map(body -> JsonUtils.prettyPrint(response.getBodyAsString().orElse("")))
195                            .orElse("<no body>");
196        }
197        return output;
198    }
199
200    /**
201     * @deprecated max parallel requests are limited by underlying HTTP client
202     */
203    @Deprecated
204    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxParallelRequests, final int maxRetries) {
205        this(maxRetries, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY,
206            RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES, null);
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * @deprecated max parallel requests are limited by underlying HTTP client
211     */
212    @Deprecated
213    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxParallelRequests, final int maxRetries, final List<Integer> statusCodes) {
214        this(maxRetries, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY,
215            statusCodes, null);
216    }
217
218    /**
219     * @deprecated max parallel requests are limited by underlying HTTP client
220     */
221    @Deprecated
222    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxParallelRequests, final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay) {
223        this(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES, null);
224    }
225
226    /**
227     * @deprecated max parallel requests are limited by underlying HTTP client
228     */
229    @Deprecated
230    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxParallelRequests, final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
231            List<Integer> statusCodes) {
232        this(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, statusCodes, null);
233    }
234
235    @Override
236    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> invoke(final ApiHttpRequest request,
237            final Function<ApiHttpRequest, CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>>> next) {
238        return failsafeExecutor.getStageAsync(() -> next.apply(request));
239    }
240
241    @Override
242    public void close() {
243    }
244}
